\usepackage{enumerate}
\usepackage{longtable}
\usepackage{booktabs}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage{fontspec}
\setmainfont[Path = input/, BoldFont = Bold.ttf, ItalicFont = Italic.ttf, BoldItalicFont = BoldItalic.ttf]{Regular.ttf}
\usepackage{background}
\usepackage{nopageno}
\backgroundsetup{scale=1,angle = 0, opacity = 1, contents = {\includegraphics[width = \paperwidth,  height = \paperheight] {input/fundo.pdf}}}
\usepackage[portuguese]{babel}

\addbibresource{input/bibliografia.bib}
